title: Next rotating game mode
body: When is the next rotating game mode? Or is it not scheduled?

replies.body:
We don't typically have a hard schedule I don't believe, but the upcoming RGM is usually listed in the patch notes just before it goes live.

With the new season starting and everyone excited for ranked, there may be a lull in RGM's for a bit.

I'd like to say that great ranked... but not everyone cares.  Why can't there be both?  RGM and ranked and just let the community decide what they wanna play and when?  I see no reason as to why RGM should be disabled just because ranks were reset.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
